程序包 aquintos.ee.metric.temp.calc.B_Team_Dev.VCUtil

类 VCUtil.ChoiceDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • aquintos.ee.metric.temp.calc.B_Team_Dev.VCUtil.VCUtil.ChoiceDialog
  • 封闭类:
    VCUtil
    public static class VCUtil.ChoiceDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for displaying choice dialogs in Eclipse UI. This class provides methods for getting single or multiple user-selected packages from a dialog, as well as displaying information dialogs.

    Example Usage: 

     {
   @code
   // Example 1: Getting multiple user-selected packages. "this" refers to the metric code which uses this method.
   Collection selectedPackages = VCUtil.ChoiceDialog.getUserSelectedPackageFromDialog("Select Packages", "Choose one or more packages:", availablePackages, preselectedPackages, this);

   // Example 2: Getting a single user-selected package. "this" refers to the metric code which uses this method.
   Object selectedPackage = VCUtil.ChoiceDialog.getSingleUserSelectedPackageFromDialog("Select Package", "Choose a package:", availablePackages, preselectedPackages, this);
 }

    • 方法详细资料

      • getUserSelectedPackageFromDialog

        public static java.util.Collection getUserSelectedPackageFromDialog​(java.lang.String Titel,
                                                                    java.lang.String Message,
                                                                    java.util.Collection InputList,
                                                                    java.util.List<?> preselectionList,
                                                                    aquintos.metric.javasupport.AbstractCalculatableSourceCode metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog)
        Displays a dialog for the user to select one or more packages. If multiple packages are selected, returns the collection of selected packages.
        参数:
        title - The title of the dialog window.
        message - The message displayed in the dialog.
        inputList - The list of available options.
        preselectionList - The preselected list of options (can be null).
        metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog - The context in which this dialog is called.
        返回:
        Collection of user-selected packages or null if canceled.

      • getSingleUserSelectedPackageFromDialog

        public static java.lang.Object getSingleUserSelectedPackageFromDialog​(java.lang.String Titel,
                                                                      java.lang.String Message,
                                                                      java.util.Collection InputList,
                                                                      java.util.List<?> preselectionList,
                                                                      aquintos.metric.javasupport.AbstractCalculatableSourceCode metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog)
        Displays a dialog for the user to select a single package. If exactly one package is selected, returns that package. If no or multiple packages are selected, displays a warning dialog.
        参数:
        title - The title of the dialog window.
        message - The message displayed in the dialog.
        inputList - The list of available options.
        preselectionList - The preselected list of options (can be null).
        metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog - The context in which this dialog is called.
        返回:
        The user-selected package or null if canceled or more than one selected.

      • getMultipleSelectionFromUserDialog

        public static java.util.Collection getMultipleSelectionFromUserDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                                                                      java.util.Collection optionsList,
                                                                      java.util.List<?> preselectionList,
                                                                      java.lang.String message,
                                                                      aquintos.metric.javasupport.AbstractCalculatableSourceCode metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog)
        Displays a dialog for the user to select multiple packages.
        参数:
        title - The title of the dialog window.
        optionsList - The list of available options.
        preselectionList - The preselected list of options (can be null).
        message - The message displayed in the dialog.
        metricBlockWhichCallsThisDialog - The context in which this dialog is called.
        返回:
        Collection of user-selected packages or null if canceled.

      • getShellSafely

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell getShellSafely()
        Gets the shell for displaying dialogs safely in the Eclipse UI.
        返回:
        The shell for displaying dialogs.
